original_text: Then David went over to the other side and stood far off on the top of the hill, with a great space between them.
korean_text: 이에 다윗이 건너편으로 가서 멀리 산 꼭대기에 서니 거리가 멀더라

sentences.original_text: Then David went over to the other side
and stood far off on the top of the hill
sentences.korean_translation: 언덕 꼭대기에서 멀리 떨어져 서 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: with a great space between them
